title: Location-Based Contextual Mobile Science Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific terminology and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on immediate workplace application of scientific terminology for current practitioners. Contextual learning content delivery via location-based push notifications

learning_goals: Learners can receive push notifications at specific locations (e.g., science labs/field sites) and utilize relevant terminology with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a mastery rate of 75% or higher in weekly quizzes after location-based learning activities
Learners appropriately apply scientific terminology in situational contexts at a rate of 90% or higher in project-based assessments at the end of the 6-month course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
